ing.item: Thinly sliced roasted red bell pepper; drained

directions.step:
Heat oil in a medium nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add onion; saute 4 minutes or until tender. Add basil and beans; cook over low heat 5 minutes, stirring frequently. Partially mash beans. Stir in bell pepper. Yield:10-2-1/2 cup servings (serving size: 1/4 cup).
Serving Ideas : Serve with Pita Chips.
Recipe by: Cooking Light, June 1994, page 76
Posted to MC-Recipe Digest by "Crane C. Walden" <cranew@foothill.net> on Mar 8, 1998
